title: (x) Handwritten cursive from W magazine mailout - carpenter {Dav}
content:
This was on an envelope containing an ad for W magazine. It was handed to me by someone else, but I'm guessing it's pretty recent. Any ideas?   
   
 ![front of envelope](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524130938im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/69545.jpg)   
 ![back of envelope](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524130938im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/69546.jpg)   
 ![back flap](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524130938im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/69547.jpg)
author: hipjazz

comments.content: WOW! That was...wow. That was very fast. Thank you!
